title: Johan：有关光照BUG & 今天又无新的build
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-6-17 22:28 编辑 






@jbernhardsson
Me and @jeb_ just fixed the lighting issues (we think). Will be in the next beta build. :)
我和 @jeb_ 刚刚修复了光照BUG（我们想【？】）。会在新的beta build版本【登场/发布】。:)

@jbernhardsson
Also, there will be no new build today. Stuff is still kind of broken but it will be even better! :)
还有，今天【也】没有新的build。bug追踪还再坏，但它将会变得更好！:)



看，跳票了！

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
bug追踪又坏了?
看来bug是正式向这个反bug网站发起进攻了

replies.txt_content: 他的意思应该是“我想我们修复好了光照bug了”吧…
